pageTitle: User Guide for the Cisco Unity Connection Phone Interface (Release 8.x) - Cisco Unity Connection Phone Menus and Voice Commands [Cisco Unity Connection] - Cisco
textBeforeTable: While listening to the Main menu, press: Revised November 16, 2010 Main Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) Recording Menu (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) After Message Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) During Message Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) Main Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) Phone Menus for Alternate Keypad Mapping S # End a recording 8 Pause or resume Key(s) Action Use the following keys while you record messages, names, and greetings: Recording Menu (Alternate Keypad Mapping X) # Cancel or back up 7 Reply 6 Save as is 5
textAfterTable: During Message Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) While listening to a message, press: Action Key(s) Forward message 1 3 Call the sender (Not available on some systems) 1 4 Play previous message 1 5 Reply 1 7 Rewind message 2 Skip message body 2 2 Delete 3 Fast-forward 4 Skip message, save as is 5 Save or restore as saved (Not available on some systems) 7 Skip to message footer 8 Fast-forward to end of message # Pause or resume * After Message Menu and Shortcuts (Alternate Keypad Mapping S) After
